contentList.content: Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Psychic damage.
You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Fire damage, and can no longer <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burn</LSTag>.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Necrotic damage.
You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Poison damage and can no longer be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoned</LSTag>.

You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Lightning damage and can no longer be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHOCKED">Shocked</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHOCKED_SURFACE">Electrocuted</LSTag>, or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING_AURA_ELECTRIFIED">Jolted</LSTag>.
The amount of <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> restored by potions increases along with your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.
The amount of <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> restored by potions increases along with your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.
Gain the ability to temporarily comprehend and verbally communicate with beasts.
Soporific Oil
When applied to a creature, they fall into a magical slumber. Condition ends when the creature takes damage or they are <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Help">Helped</LSTag>.
Cures any form of disease.
Affected creature is cured of all disease.
Gain an additional <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag>. On your following turn, you will lose an Action.
Cures all forms of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blindness</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralysis</LSTag>.
Affected creature is cured of all forms of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blindness</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralysis</LSTag>.
Drink to fall into a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLEEP">Slumber</LSTag> for three turns. You gain the benefits of a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.
Drink to fall into a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLEEP">Slumber</LSTag> for three turns. You gain the benefits of a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Affected creature's <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> is indefinitely reduced by 1.
Affected creature has gained <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Bite_MothersLoathing">Bite</LSTag>.
Something waits for you to sleep...
Affected creature's <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> is reduced by 2. They cannot take <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reactions</LSTag>.
Affected creature's <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> is increased by 2.
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on Wisdom based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Affected creature is <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to poison damage.
Affected creature is hostile to all other creatures.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> by 2.
Affected creature's <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> has increased by 2.
Drink to increase your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by 2. Replaces effects from other elixirs when drunk.
Affected creature's <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> has increased by 2.
Drink to enter a bloodlust. Once per turn when you kill a foe, you gain [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag>. Replaces effects from other elixirs when drunk.
Affected creature has entered a murderous state of bloodlust. Once per turn, when it kills an enemy, it gains [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag>.
You have entered a murderous state of bloodlust. Once per turn, when you kill an enemy, you gain [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag>.
Affected creature's has been granted <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag> due to their bloodlust.
Elixir of Reverence
Become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLESS">Blessed</LSTag>. Replaces effects from other elixirs when drunk.
Elixir of Reverence
Affected creature is <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLESS">Blessed</LSTag>.

Drink to gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">Concentration</LSTag> based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>, and against being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag>. Additionally, magic can't put you to sleep. Replaces effects from other elixirs when drunk.

Affected creature's ability to maintain its spells has increased.

It has Advantage to Saving Throws against being Charmed and for maintaining Concentration. Additionally, magic can't put it to sleep.
Drink to gain a +4 bonus to Initiative. In addition, you can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprised</LSTag>. Replaces effects from other elixirs when drunk.
Affected creature has a +4 bonus to Initiative and can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprised</LSTag>.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> by 2. Replaces effects from other elixirs when drunk.
Affected creature's <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> has increased by 2.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> by 2. Replaces effects from other elixirs when drunk.
Affected creature's <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> has increased by 2.
Gain an additional Level 1, 2, and 3 <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag>. Replaces effects from other elixirs when drunk.
Affected creature has an additional Level 1, 2, and 3 <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag>.
Elixir of Vigilance
Affected creature has a +2 bonus to Initiative and can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprised</LSTag>. Replaces effects from other elixirs when drunk.
